subject: Schedule of fee for legal charges to advocates/Techno Legal Experts/ Law firms.
text: Hay <rl TTHNf xfuaru Phone 91-11-25074100/25074200 (as7 4a67 317_TytHT 464) 47 Fax 91-11-25093507 25093514 R1 < National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways) #-5 0 6,' 842(-10, GTrdI, T/ fedf-110075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 No. 11041/217/2007-Admn Dated: 04.06.2014 Policy Matters: Administration Finance (L40/2014) (Decision taken on File No NHAI/DR&ACellAdvocate/2010) Sub: Schedule of fee for Legal Chargeg to Advocateg/Techno Legal Expert/Law Firms In supersession to Policy Circular No. (Admn/Fin) 70/2010 dated 24.12.2010 on the captioned subject, the revised "Schedule of Fee" payable to Advocates/Techno Legal Experts/Law Firms is enclosed herewith at Annex-I for strict compliance. However; in exceptional circumstances, wherever the higher charges beyond the "Schedule of Fee" is warranted invariably,  specific   prior  approval of the Competent Authority shall be obtained: 2. The Schedule of Fee shall come into force with immediate effect. 3_ This issues with the approval of Competent Authority. Encl: As above ` (04 (VKSharma) Chief General Manager (LA & Coord ) To: All officers and employees of HQROs/PIUS/CMUs/Site Offices {ra NHAI F99)
